content.raw:
The answer to your question is covered in [sdformat pull request 83](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/83/sdf-15-add-flag-to-fix-joint-axis-frame-43). An sdf_1.4 model that is converted to 1.5 should have the `use_parent_model_frame` set to true (legacy behavior), and there is a [test for this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/83/sdf-15-add-flag-to-fix-joint-axis-frame-43/diff#Ltest/integration/joint_axis_frame.ccT43).

Models written in sdf 1.5 without the `use_parent_model_frame` tag will be given a default value of false (better behavior). So we will need to communicate this change to our users writing new models, but old models will still work.
